short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show how many tokens and resources the conversation consumed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Conversation Insights & Environmental Impact Tracker


Enhance your ChatGPT experience with our innovative Chrome extension, designed to bring awareness to the environmental footprint of digital interactions. This tool is perfect for environmentally conscious individuals, technology enthusiasts, and anyone looking to gain insights into their usage patterns with ChatGPT.


Key Features:

Token Count Tracking: Get an instant display of the number of tokens generated in each ChatGPT conversation, helping you understand the size and complexity of your interactions.
Water Consumption Estimates: With every conversation, the extension calculates an estimated amount of water consumed to power the digital infrastructure behind your interactions. This unique feature aims to highlight the often-overlooked environmental cost of online activities.
Real-time Data: All information, including token counts and water consumption estimates, is provided in real-time, offering you a transparent view of your digital and environmental footprint as you chat.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, our extension seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience without overwhelming you with data, making it accessible for everyone.


Why Install?

Promote Environmental Awareness: By making the invisible visible, our extension educates users about the environmental implications of their digital behavior, encouraging more sustainable tech usage.
Optimize ChatGPT Use: Understanding the token count can help optimize conversations with ChatGPT, leading to more efficient and effective interactions.
Support Sustainability: Join a community of users who are taking a step towards reducing their environmental impact, one conversation at a time.
Empower yourself with knowledge and contribute to a more sustainable future by installing our ChatGPT Conversation Insights & Environmental Impact Tracker today.
